body_html:
@girving stateless_random_uniform_int is added to API because in tensorflow/core/api_def/base_api/api_def_StatelessRandomUniformInt.pbtxt visibility is VISIBLE by default. If you want to hide it from API, you can set it to HIDDEN.

tensorflow/tensorflow/core/framework/api_def.proto

Line 51 in 31e9d08

Visibility visibility = 2;

Anyhow, this sounds like a bug in api_compatibility_test if the test is passing. I will try to reproduce it.

body:
@girving `stateless_random_uniform_int` is added to API because in tensorflow/core/api_def/base_api/api_def_StatelessRandomUniformInt.pbtxt `visibility` is `VISIBLE` by default. If you want to hide it from API, you can set it to `HIDDEN`. https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/31e9d08398a2118537abc1a02f47376c4d2c7d9d/tensorflow/core/framework/api_def.proto#L51

Anyhow, this sounds like a bug in api_compatibility_test if the test is passing. I will try to reproduce it.
